name: mobx.dart
description: This file is purely to leverage NPM for running the scripts. This is NOT to track any dependencies.

scripts.get:mobx: pushd mobx; pub get; popd mobx
scripts.gen:mobx_examples: pushd mobx_examples; flutter packages pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs; popd mobx_examples
scripts.gen:mobx_codegen: pushd mobx_codegen; flutter packages pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs; popd mobx_examples
